title: La Cumparsita
description: Often referred to as the anthem of Tango, this iconic piece is a must-have in any tango playlist.

title: Por una Cabeza
description: A classic tango song that has been featured in numerous films and is beloved by dancers worldwide.

title: El Choclo
description: One of the most popular tangos, known for its catchy melody and rhythm.

title: Mi Buenos Aires Querido
description: A heartfelt tribute to the city of Buenos Aires, capturing the essence of tango's birthplace.

title: Adiós Muchachos
description: A nostalgic tango piece that reflects on the passage of time and farewells.

title: La Yumba
description: Known for its strong, rhythmic style, this piece is a favorite among tango dancers.

title: Libertango
description: A modern tango composition that blends traditional tango with jazz elements.

title: A Media Luz
description: A romantic tango that has been popular since its release in the 1920s.

title: Caminito
description: A classic tango that speaks of longing and unrequited love.

title: La Morocha
description: One of the earliest tangos to gain international fame, known for its lively tempo.
